job_description: This position is limited to students that are registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University The team is seeking a Cloud Computing coop to work with Alcatel-Lucentâ€™s professional services team. The candidates in this role will be required to support other Alcatel-Lucent employees in providing professional services to customers. The support will include working on design details and proof of concepts in labs. Working with OpenStack, CloudStack, vCAC and other orchestration products and potentially updating the workflows to accommodate customer requests. Some of the work could involve: Deploy customer network as per design guidelines defined by the architectural team, and potentially being involved in the architectural decisions if possible.Front customer network issues and coordinate with the support organization on resolving any issues.Help with Proof of Concept engagement with customers, demoing Alcatel-Lucent Nuage solution.Deliver customized workshops and technical training to customers.
